definition[0]: someone who dies for their religious or political beliefs and is admired by people for this
example[0]: St Stephen, the first Christian martyr
example[1]: The army has been held back because the government is reluctant to make martyrs of the protesters.
example[2]: He was a martyr to the cause of racial harmony.
definition[1]: someone who tries hard to get other people’s sympathy by complaining about how hard their life is – used to show disapproval
example[3]: I think she rather relishes the role of martyr.
definition[2]: if someone is martyred, they are killed because of their religious beliefs
example[5]: Catherine was martyred for her faith.
